response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special offer of $14,000 for it. This price not only represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset but also ensures a fair return for us.
